name: [LIGHTS OUT]
description:
There's been a big power leakage at an offshore power plant, and too much excess electricity is out and about! Will you guide a drone through the magnetic light cores in the plant and get rid of the excess electricity? Or will you leave the lights to overrun the place?

[LIGHTS OUT] is a 5 level, fast-paced platformer focused on quick movements and responding to different structural challenges in each level.

The player control the character by using the spacebar to jump

Designed by Aaron V.

FEATURES

  • Fun and fast platforming!
  • Take a nosedive towards each goal!
  • Launch yourself from ramps!
  • Fall off the edge! (maybe more than once)

Assets Used:

  • SNAPS Asset Packs - Scifi / Industrial Pack 1 — Asset Store Originals
  • Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown — Borodar
  • Cartoon FX Free — Jean Moreno (JMO)
  • LowPoly Water — Ebru Dogan
  • Sci fi Drones — Lukas Bobor
  • Mission A — TeknoAXE (Background Music)
  • Sci-fi computer sounds and beeps — Michel Baradari
